services.subtitle: We are always ready to support you with professional consultation services
services.gift_description: Help you choose meaningful handcrafted gifts for all occasions - holidays, birthdays, anniversaries, or client appreciation.
services.custom_description: Create unique products based on your ideas. From design to completion, we accompany you throughout the process.
services.care_description: Provide in-depth knowledge on how to preserve and care for handcrafted products to maintain their beauty long-term.
services.consulting_description: Consult on the origin, cultural significance, and artistic value of each traditional handcrafted product.
services.cta_description: Contact us via hotline 0907 882 878 or fill out the form for free consultation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1_answer: Standard delivery time is 3-5 business days for available products. For custom orders, it may take 2-4 weeks depending on product complexity.
faq.q2_answer: Yes, we support nationwide delivery. Shipping costs are calculated based on weight and distance. Orders over 1,000,000 VND receive free shipping within Ho Chi Minh City.
faq.q3_answer: Absolutely! We specialize in custom orders. You can share your ideas and desired designs, and we will provide consultation and detailed quotes. Please contact us via the consultation form or call our hotline for best support.
faq.q4_answer: We accept returns within 7 days from the date of receipt if the product is defective due to manufacturing. Returned products must be intact, unused, and include all invoices and accessories.
